name: pc-parts-lists-manager
description: A software application for managing DIY PC parts lists, enabling users to create, save, and manage multiple parts lists locally, with printing and screenshot sharing functionalities.一款用于管理DIY主机配件清单的应用程序，可以在本地创建、保存和管理多个配件清单，并且提供了打印和截图共享功能。
author: Karasukaigan
